snippet.title: HITME - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on:
https://xiri.itch.io/hitme

It's Friday's night, Nam's looking for someone to beat him. A suicidal act that will save his life when he meets Astra and Dei, two kind boys who will  take care of him. 

HITME's visual novel set on Santiago de Chile. A kind of homoerotic fantasy full of fascinating colors and music. Drink Terremotos and learn to make Empanadas  with the handsome couple, Astra and Dei.
